statements.select: SELECT ID as UserId , UserName , LoginId , UseYn , PwdCompare(#Password#, Password) as IsPwCheck FROM dbo.TUser WHERE LoginId = #LoginId#
statements.insert: INSERT INTO dbo.LoginLogModel ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, UserId, LoginId, Version, MainSkin, GridSkin, IpAddress, MacAddress, Status ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #UserId#, #LoginId#, #Version#, #MainSkin#, #GridSkin#, #IpAddress#, #MacAddress#, '0' )
statements.update: UPDATE dbo.TLoginLog SET UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName= #UpdateByName# WHERE UserID = #UserID# AND MacAddress = #MacAddress# AND UpdateDate IS NULL
statements.select:
WITH MenuList (MenuID, MenuLevel, HierID) AS ( SELECT AA.ID AS MenuID , 1 AS MenuLevel , CAST(RIGHT('0000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.SortOrder, AA.ID)), 4) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) as HierID FROM dbo.TMenu AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.UseYn = 'Y'
AND CASE WHEN #MenuGroup# IN ('SYS','RDS','LIB') THEN AA.ParentID ELSE AA.ID END = ( SELECT CONVERT(INT, Value) FROM dbo.TCode WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE Code = #MenuGroup# AND ParentCode = 'MenuGroup' AND Value IS NOT NULL )
AND AA.ID = #ID#
AND AA.ParentID IS NULL
UNION ALL SELECT AA.ID AS MenuID , BB.MenuLevel + 1 AS MenuLevel , CAST(BB.HierID+ '-' + RIGHT('0000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.SortOrder, AA.ID)), 4) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS HierID FROM dbo.TMenu AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN MenuList BB ON AA.ParentID = BB.MenuID WHERE AA.UseYn = 'Y' ) SELECT AA.ID as MenuID , AA.ParentId as ParentID , AA.MenuName as MenuName , BB.MenuLevel as MenuLevel , BB.HierId as HierID , FF.Assembly as Assembly , DD.Namespace as Namespace , DD.Instance as Instance , DD.ViewType as ViewType , 'N' AS BookmarkYn , ISNULL(( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM dbo.TMenu BB WHERE BB.ParentID = AA.ID), 0) AS ChildCount , CASE WHEN DD.ID IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS ViewYn , 'N' AS EditYn FROM dbo.TMenu AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN MenuList BB ON AA.ID = BB.MenuID LEFT JOIN dbo.TMenuView CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ID = CC.MenuID LEFT JOIN dbo.TView DD WITH (NOLOCK) ON CC.ViewID = DD.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TModule FF WITH (NOLOCK) ON DD.ModuleID = FF.ID WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY BB.HierID

SELECT AA.ID as MenuID , AA.MenuName as MenuName , CC.ID as ViewID , CC.ViewName as ViewName , CC.ViewType as ViewType , EE.Assembly as Assembly , CC.Namespace as Namespace , CC.Instance as Instance FROM dbo.TMenu AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN dbo.TMenuView BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ID = BB.MenuID INNER JOIN dbo.TView CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON BB.ViewID = CC.ID INNER JOIN dbo.TModule EE WITH (NOLOCK) ON CC.ModuleID = EE.ID WHERE AA.ID = #ID#

SELECT AA.ID as ButtonID , AA.ButtonName as ButtonName , AA.Instance as Instance FROM dbo.TButton AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN dbo.TViewButton BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ID = BB.ButtonID INNER JOIN dbo.TMenuView CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON BB.ViewID = CC.ViewID WHERE CC.MenuID = #ID# ORDER BY AA.ID
SELECT AA.PhysicalName as Code , AA.LogicalName as Value FROM dbo.TDictionary AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.LanguageCode = #LanguageCode# ORDER BY AA.PhysicalName
SELECT AA.PhysicalName as Code , AA.LogicalName as Value FROM dbo.TMessage AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.LanguageCode = #LanguageCode# ORDER BY AA.PhysicalName
